member.name: T:LeoCorpLibrary.NetworkConnection
member.summary: Class that contains methods to get and test the user's Internet connection.

summary.para: Allows you to know if the user is connected to Internet.
The connection is tested by default on https://bing.com.
Allows you to know if the user is connected to Internet asynchronously.
The connection is tested by default on https://bing.com.

member.name: M:LeoCorpLibrary.NetworkConnection.IsAvailableTestSite(System.String)

summary.para: Allows you to know if the user is connected to Internet.
The connection is tested on the specified website.

member.param: Website where the connection is tested.

member.name: M:LeoCorpLibrary.NetworkConnection.IsAvailableTestSiteAsync(System.String)

summary.para: Allows you to know if the user is connected to Internet asynchronously.
The connection is tested on the specified website.

member.param: Website where the connection is tested.
